moves.2... Nf6 3. g4: White gives a pawn, but the rook gets an half-open h line.
moves.3... fxg4 4. hxg4 Nxg4 5. Qd3: Black can not protect the pawn at h7 with the Knight. When black does this, he will lose a rook or will be checkmated!
moves.5... Nf6: Mistake! Better is g6, it blocks the queen.
moves.6. Rxh7: when black takes the rook, he will be checkmated by Qg6#.
